CmdLine: {         echo 'http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/alpine/v3.7/main';         echo 'http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/alpine/v3.7/community';         echo 'http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/alpine/edge/main';         echo 'http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/alpine/edge/community';         echo 'http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/alpine/edge/testing';     } > /etc/apk/repositories && 	apk add --no-cache --upgrade apk-tools tzdata && 	cp /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/localtime && 	echo "Asia/Shanghai" > /etc/timezone && 	apk del tzdata
Commands.Name: run
